titles: The Turkish secretary containing the art of expressing ones thoughts, without seeing, speaking, or writing to one another : with the circumstances of a Turkish adventure : as also a most curious relation of translated by the author of the Monthly account.
author: Du Vignau, sieur des Joanots.
Phillips, John, 1631-1706.
publisher: Printed by J.B. and sold by Jo. Hindmarsh ... and Randal Taylor ...,
notes: Translation by John Phillips of: Le secretaire turc.
Written by Du Vignau. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
